description: Try our easy to follow Ham And Egg White Omelette recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Ham And Egg White Omelette Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 slice triple smoked leg ham (97% Fat Free, from the deli)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine chia seeds and milk in a small bowl. Set aside for 5 minutes to thicken.
Meanwhile, whisk egg whites in a medium bowl until soft peaks form. Add chia mixture and chives and whisk until stiff peaks form.

Heat a 20cm (base) non-stick frying pan over medium heat. Add oil and swirl to coat base of pan. Add egg white mixture to pan and spread out roughly. Cook for 2 minutes or until puffed and golden underneath. Loosen edge and flip over, and cook for a further 1 minute.
Turn out onto a plate, then top one half with rocket, tomato, avocado and ham. Season with pepper and fold over to enclose. Serve.
